body.p:
Nicholasville Ky
March 24th 1863
D. C. Wickliffe Esqr
DSir
Hugh T. McCabe of this county has been fined for a Breach of the peace & herewith presents his Petition to the Gov asking that his fine may be remitted

I know Mr McCabe will and whilst he sometimes indulges to excess in the use of ardent spirits (and I suppose this was the case at the time the offence was committed) he is an inoffensive man and when not under that influence, a very peaceable
man, He has for some time past been confined to his home by severe diseases and is now quite feble. He has for several months past been sober and I hope in future so continues. I hope you may present his case to the Gov and urge the remission of the fine if consistent with his official dutys
By so doing you will confer a favor up me and many of your friends
